verses.verse: <S%G2532><s%> I saw, <S%G1492><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the right hand <S%G1188><s%> of him who sat <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the throne, <S%G2362><s%> a book <S%G975><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> inside <S%G2081><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> outside, <S%G3693><s%> sealed <S%G2696><s%> shut with seven <S%G2033><s%> seals. <S%G4973><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> a mighty <S%G2478><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> proclaiming <S%G2784><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> "Who <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> to open <S%G455><s%> the book, <S%G975><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to break <S%G3089><s%> its <S%G846><s%> seals? <S%G4973><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> No one <S%G3762><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> above, <S%G3761><s%> or on <S%G1909><s%> the earth, <S%G1093><s%> or <S%G3761><s%> under <S%G5270><s%> the earth, <S%G1093><s%> was able <S%G1410><s%> to open <S%G455><s%> the book, <S%G975><s%> or <S%G975><s%> to look <S%G991><s%> in it. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> wept <S%G2799><s%> much, <S%G4183><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> no one <S%G3762><s%> was found <S%G2147><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> to open <S%G455><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G314><s%> the book, <S%G975><s%> or <S%G3777><s%> to look <S%G991><s%> in it. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the elders <S%G4245><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to me, <S%G3427><s%> "Don't <S%G3361><s%> weep. <S%G2799><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> the Lion <S%G3023><s%> who is <S%G5607><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Judah, <S%G2448><s%> the Root <S%G4491><s%> of David, <S%G1138><s%> has overcome; <S%G3528><s%> he who opens <S%G455><s%> the book <S%G975><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G99999><s%> its <S%G846><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> seals. <S%G4973><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the throne <S%G2362><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the four <S%G5064><s%> living creatures, <S%G2226><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the elders, <S%G4245><s%> a Lamb <S%G721><s%> standing, <S%G2476><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> though it had been slain, <S%G4969><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> horns, <S%G2768><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> eyes, <S%G3788><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> Spirits <S%G4151><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> sent out <S%G649><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the earth. <S%G1093><s%>

Then <S%G2532><s%> he came, <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he took <S%G2983><s%> it <S%G975><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the right hand <S%G1188><s%> of him who sat <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the throne. <S%G2362><s%>

Now <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> he had taken <S%G2983><s%> the book, <S%G975><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> living creatures <S%G2226><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the twenty <S%G1501><s%> - four <S%G5064><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%> fell down <S%G4098><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the Lamb, <S%G721><s%> each <S%G1538><s%> one having <S%G2192><s%> a harp, <S%G2788><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> golden <S%G5552><s%> bowls <S%G5357><s%> full <S%G1073><s%> of incense, <S%G2368><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> the prayers <S%G4335><s%> of the saints. <S%G40><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They sang <S%G103><s%> a new <S%G2537><s%> song, <S%G5603><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "You are <S%G1488><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> to take <S%G2983><s%> the book, <S%G975><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to open <S%G455><s%> its <S%G846><s%> seals: <S%G4973><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> you were killed, <S%G4969><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> bought <S%G59><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> for God <S%G2316><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> blood, <S%G129><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of every <S%G3956><s%> tribe, <S%G5443><s%> language, <S%G1100><s%> people, <S%G2992><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> nation, <S%G1484><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> made <S%G4160><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> kings <S%G935><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> priests <S%G2409><s%> to our <S%G2257><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> we will reign <S%G936><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> earth. <S%G1093><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> I saw, <S%G1492><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> something like a voice <S%G5456><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> around <S%G2943><s%> the throne, <S%G2362><s%> <S%G2532><s%> the living creatures, <S%G2226><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the elders; <S%G4245><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the number <S%G706><s%> of them <S%G846><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> ten thousands <S%G3461><s%> of ten thousands, <S%G3461><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thousands <S%G5505><s%> of thousands; <S%G5505><s%>

saying <S%G3004><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> "Worthy <S%G514><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the Lamb <S%G721><s%> who has been killed <S%G4969><s%> to receive <S%G2983><s%> the power, <S%G1411><s%> wealth, <S%G4149><s%> wisdom, <S%G4678><s%> strength, <S%G2479><s%> honor, <S%G5092><s%> glory, <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> blessing! <S%G2129><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> created thing <S%G2938><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the earth, <S%G1093><s%> <S%G2532><s%> under <S%G5270><s%> the earth, <S%G1093><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G99999><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the sea, <S%G2281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> everything <S%G3956><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "To him who sits <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the throne, <S%G2362><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to the Lamb <S%G721><s%> be the blessing, <S%G2129><s%> <S%G2532><s%> the honor, <S%G5092><s%> <S%G2532><s%> the glory, <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the dominion, <S%G2904><s%> <S%G1519><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> and ever! <S%G165><s%> Amen!"

<S%G2532><s%> The four <S%G5064><s%> living creatures <S%G2226><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "Amen! <S%G281><s%>" <S%G2532><s%> The elders <S%G4245><s%> fell down <S%G4098><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> worshiped. <S%G4352><s%>
